title: Essentials of Electrical Safety
headline: A free online practical training course to teach you safe practices and methods while working with electricity.
description: Electrical safety practices compel a workforce to take suitable precautions while handling electrical devices or equipment. This practical electrical engineering course explains the science of electricity followed by the safety issues in the workplace. It also covers electrical safety laws. You will understand the safety aspects of any electrical equipment and take the right decisions to control and reduce accidents.
courseDescription:
You may have heard of arc flash accidents or cases of electrical shock in swimming pools. Imagine a situation when someone qualified knows what to do in such situations. Electricity comes with its conveniences and plenty of uses and, if handled well, you can control or reduce mishaps. In this course, you will learn basic concepts before diving into the safety aspects of working with electricity.

The theoretical explanation of what current, voltage, resistance and capacitance are guides you to grasping the practical aspects of working with electrical devices or tools. You will gain adequate technical knowledge to understand the safety manuals and be confident enough to take appropriate actions. The section on safety laws and regulations is brief but useful for anyone who has to manage or supervise in a work environment consisting of electrical equipment.

The topics covering risk assessments, inspection and testing will simplify the idea of safety precautions as you will learn to provide a safe working area. Engineers, electricians and many other professionals work with electricity everyday - electrical safety specialists will always be in demand for their capability to identify potential hazards and minimise any risk to life or property. You can take advantage of this free training course and enrol today.
